DLG a
"CACTUS, CACTUS, CACTUS MAN. I WANT TO BE, A CACTUS MAN."

DLG b
"You get a notification on your cell phone. "Gamesboy1996 is live on Twitch!" You do not know who this is nor do you care."

DLG c
"Wait you have a cell phone why aren't you using that?????"

DLG d
"I'm a bottle of nasty nasty Dasani(tm) water! I'm humanity's last resort in quenching thirst. Looks like you're running out of options buckaroo."

DLG e
"Hi. My name's Big Man Cactus Chris. While I am neither big nor a man I am a cactus, so that must count for something."

DLG f
"Go away, I'm watching reruns of Malcolm in the Middle of the Desert. What does that entail you ask? Take a wild guess, pal."

DLG g
"Whinny" (I'm a horse who doesn't play by the rules! This isn't your mama's desert adventure!"

DLG h
"Who am I? I'm you but quenched."

DLG i
If you're reading this you've taken some very strange turns my friend
